gamerule.everythingTurnsIntoSculk.descri: Whether to turn all blocks, not just natural ones, into Sculk, when a Sculk Catalyst spreads Sculk.
gamerule.sculkSpreadSpawnWarden: Sculk can spawn Wardens when spreading
gamerule.sculkSpreadSpawnWarden.descript: Whether Sculk Shriekers generated artificially by a Sculk Catalyst can summon the Warden.
gamerule.sculkCatalystSpreadTickdelay.de: The delay (in ticks) it takes for a Sculk Catalyst to spread Sculk.
gamerule.sculkCatalystSpreadAmount.descr: The amount of growth (in xp) which the Sculk Catalyst gains when spreading on its own.
